TopicTitle: How Many Is Too Many Mods???

Articles.Content:
So......how many?

27
Mod 'er till she crashes!
Too many is however many you need to make the experience most satisfying for you +1. An easy rule of thumb.
sqrt(-1)

Mod to your heart's content - or until your computer starts spewing smoke. The good news is that KSP Version 1.1 will run in Unity 5 which better supports mods so you can add even more.

JR
When your game crashes every other time you revert.. yeah... might want to cut back a lil ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)
All of them that were, all of them that are, and all of them will be.
I should have known responses would get philosophical near-instantaneously when bringing up modding lol.

> 
> I should have known responses would get philosophical near-instantaneously when bringing up modding lol.

What did you expect? There is no practical answer outside of "however many it takes to make the game unstable". Everyone has a different hardware configuration, and everyone has different standards for how many mods they "need".

> 
> What did you expect? There is no practical answer outside of "however many it takes to make the game unstable". Everyone has a different hardware configuration, and everyone has different standards for how many mods they "need".

I dont know, a number. ![:sticktongue:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue2.gif)

> 
> I dont know' date=' a number. ![:sticktongue:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue2.gif)[/quote']
> 1 divided by 0 number of mods.
As many as necessary.

> 
> I should have known responses would get philosophical near-instantaneously when bringing up modding lol.

To mod, or not to mod, that tis the question.
You know you have too many mods installed when your computer bursts into flames and melts a hole in your desk, falling to the floor to form a puddle of molten metal.
And on the eighth day He created the first mod.
Until your game starts OOMng a whole lot. I think I'm pretty close to that for me, damn 32bits memory limit of 3.5 (actually, it's closer to 4, I've had it hold out near or past 3.5).

Three Mods. No more. No less. Three shalt be the number of mods thou shalt install, and the number of installed mods shall be three. Four shalt thou not install, nor either install thou two, excepting that thou then proceed to install three. Five is right out. Once mod number three, being the third mod, be installed, then, starteth thou game, and launcheth thine little green men into space.

> 
> I dont know' date=' a number. ![:sticktongue:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue2.gif)[/quote']
> Pretty sure the answer to this one is not 42, unless you're running 64 bit on Linux ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

> 
> Three Mods. No more. No less. Three shalt be the number of mods thou shalt install, and the number of installed mods shall be three. Four shalt thou not install, nor either install thou two, excepting that thou then proceed to install three. Five is right out. Once mod number three, being the third mod, be installed, then, starteth thou game, and launcheth thine little green men into space.

I blame Renegrade for the ongoing epidemic of Monty Python quotes. He started it.
I would tax all people quoting Monty Python.
Ah man, I can't believe I missed making a Princess Bride reference by saying "One more, as always"...

CKAN says: 104. ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

There's some split mods counted twice ofc.

KSP-AVC says 42.

I say, whatever is fun ![;)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif)
Fleventeen

Similar questions: "How much money is too much money?" "How much fun is too much fun?"

Answer to all three: Whenever it's becoming a problem for you.
How much RAM do you have?
